data.message: You've got to respect this guy, Eminem went through some real shit to the point where he lost it and let out the monster. Let it do its worst, say it's worst, take over. Now, Marshall seems ok and his music and lyrics are his best yet because he made it through what only the monster inside could. It's almost like one has dropped the mic and the other has picked it up.

replies.message: Dude your words just made so much fucking sense to me that I might've just had an extreme epiphany...I write and do rap myself. I think its time I let my monster out cause I fucking need something to get me thru this shit Im going thru.
